flavorText: It uproots entire fengrafs to add to its twisted frame.

name: Ghoultree
originalText: Ghoultree costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Ghoultree’s ability can’t reduce the total cost to cast the spell below {G}.
Although players may respond to Ghoultree once it’s been cast, once it’s announced, they can’t respond before the cost is calculated and paid.

text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
